content: in a legal dispute between two companies the court in rome issued a final decision the company referred to as srl had brought claims against the company referred to as spa but the court rejected these claims instead the court ordered the srl to pay the spa a sum of €1943324529 along with interest the court also ruled that the srl must pay court costs and professional fees the dispute arose from a loan agreement for a housing complex with the srl claiming damages and repayment of usurious interest however the court found these claims to be unfounded the spa counterclaimed for the outstanding loan balance and the court ruled in their favor the court also determined that the srl failed to prove allegations of abusive conduct and economic dependence by the spa the court considered bank statements as evidence of the debt and found them to be unquestionable additionally the court awarded costs to the spa the final decision was made on november 4 2019
